verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to those who <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H5833>help,<s%> [And] <S%H8172>rely<s%> on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> And <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H7393>chariots<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they are <S%H7227>many,<s%> And in <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they are <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6105>strong,<s%> But they do not <S%H8159>look<s%> to the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord!<s%>

Yet He <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H2450>wise<s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H9563>disaster,<s%> And does not <S%H5493>retract<s%> His <S%H1697>words,<s%> But will <S%H6965>arise<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers,<s%> And <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5833>help<s%> of the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>

Now the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> are <S%H120>men,<s%> and not <S%H410>God,<s%> And their <S%H5483>horses<s%> are <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and not <S%H7307>spirit;<s%> So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out His <S%H3027>hand,<s%> And he who <S%H5826>helps<s%> will <S%H3782>stumble<s%> And he who is <S%H5826>helped<s%> will <S%H5307>fall,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> of them will <S%H3615>come<s%> to an <S%H3615>end<s%> <S%H9191>together.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to me, "As the <S%H9030>lion<s%> or the <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lion<s%> <S%H1897>growls<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H2964>prey,<s%> <S%H5921>Against<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> a <S%H4393>band<s%> of <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> out, Will not be <S%H2865>terrified<s%> at their <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6031>disturbed<s%> at their <S%H1995>noise,<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> will the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H6633>wage<s%> <S%H6633>war<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> and on its <S%H1389>hill.<s%>"

Like <S%H5774>flying<s%> <S%H6833>birds<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> will <S%H1598>protect<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> He will <S%H1598>protect<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> [it;] He will <S%H6452>pass<s%> <S%H6452>over<s%> and <S%H4422>rescue<s%> [it.]
<S%H7725>Return<s%> to Him from <S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H6009>deeply<s%> <S%H5627>defected,<s%> O <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For in that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> will <S%H3988>cast<s%> <S%H3988>away<s%> his <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H457>idols<s%> and his <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H457>idols,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H3027>hands<s%> have <S%H6213>made<s%> as a <S%H2399>sin.<s%>

And the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> by a <S%H2719>sword<s%> not of <S%H376>man,<s%> And a <S%H2719>sword<s%> not of <S%H120>man<s%> will <S%H398>devour<s%> him. So he will not <S%H5127>escape<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> And his <S%H970>young<s%> <S%H970>men<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H4522>forced<s%> <S%H4522>laborers.<s%>

"And his <S%H5553>rock<s%> will <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>away<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of <S%H4032>panic,<s%> And his <S%H8269>princes<s%> will be <S%H2865>terrified<s%> at the <S%H5251>standard,<s%>" <S%H5002>Declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H217>fire<s%> is in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> and whose <S%H8574>furnace<s%> is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
